unnormalised: Paying my electricity bill online is like donating Rs. 5000 to Ambani every month - feels like a Bollywood drama where I'm the struggling hero and he's the villain with all the ₹₹₹. Sigh, at least the AC works!
normalised: Paying my electricity bill online is like donating rupee five thousand to Ambani every month - feels like a Bollywood drama where I'm the struggling hero and he's the villain with all the rupees rupees rupees. Sigh, at least the A-C works!
